goals__remit:
The purpose of EWA is to promote the legitimate joint interests of its members in a European and international landscape by facilitating the exchange of technical, legal, environmental and social information between its members.  
 
It shall consist of promoting knowledge and understanding by all stakeholders of the activities of its members and their position in the European economy.
